categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ahkar was a male Human Sergeant of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum he traveled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. Ahkar greeted the Alliance Commander who departed with Miot Dengd and Theron Shan on a mission to take down a Star Fortress.
Sergeant Ahkar appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the Alliance base on Odessen and begins the Star Fortress missions for the Republic players.
